name: MonsterBall
description:
Welcome to the world of MonsterBall!

MonsterBall is a physics based tossing/throwing/launching/flight/distance game of skill with two simple steps...

Step 1 - Press to set the angle
Step 2 - Release to set the power

Along the way, your monster will encounter friendly monsters that will lend a boost and silly monsters that will slow you down.

See how far your cute little monster goes!

Getting MonsterBall

Currently MonsterBall can be played for free (ad-supported) on Google Play.

Ad-free versions of the MonsterBall (for OS X, Windows, and Linux) are available below.
